subject: Horse Racing
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: KENNETT SQUARE, Pa., May 21 (AP) — Treadmills pinpoint what is wrong with an ailing horse. Pools ease the transition to stability from surgery. Monorails make sure that horses can stay off their feet after an operation.
